changes.change: Rewrote tweak from the ground up, fixed manu bugs.
Made status bar and overlay display properly on lock screen
Status bar and overlay now hide when in edit mode on iPhone X or on phones with iPhone X features enabled.
Fixed an issue where the bottom edge of the rectangle is misaligned causing the bottom corners to cut off and flash sometimes.
Changed spacing for all devices, should fix issues with status bar elements escaping the status bar.
Removed small black bar on bottom of screen
Added compatibility for LittleX, Homegestures, Fluidity, and any similar tweaks that change the status bar to the iPhone X styled status bar
